languages.text: {n}Соломон вновь надолго задумывается, а затем с сомнением произносит:{/n} "Поди знай... Если я скажу, что вы — особенн{mf|ый|ая}, это будет звучать банально, да? Но так и есть. Прежде я не встречал людей, подобных вам".

{n}Solomorne lapses into thought again for a long time, and then says doubtfully,{/n} "There is no simple answer... If I say you are special, it sounds hackneyed, doesn't it? But it's the truth. I've never met anyone like you before."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон вновь надолго задумывается, а затем с сомнением произносит:{/n} "Поди знай... Если я скажу, что вы — особенн{mf|ый|ая}, это будет звучать банально, да? Но так и есть. Прежде я не встречал людей, подобных вам".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne lapses into thought again for a long time, and then says doubtfully,{/n} "There is no simple answer... If I say you are a special, it sounds hackneyed, doesn't it? But it's the truth. I've never met anyone like you before."

{n}Solomorne lapses into thought again for a long time, and then says doubtfully,{/n} "There is no simple answer... If I say you are a special, it sounds hackneyed, doesn't it? But it's the truth. I've never met anyone like you before."

{n}Solomorne lapses into thought again for a long time, and then says doubtfully,{/n} "There is no simple answer... If I say you are a special, it sounds hackneyed, doesn't it? But it's the truth. I've never met anyone like you before."

{n}Solomorne lapses into thought again for a long time, and then says doubtfully,{/n} "There is no simple answer... If I say you are special, it sounds hackneyed, doesn't it? But it's the truth. I've never met anyone like you before."

{n}Solomorne lapses into thought again for a long time, and then says doubtfully,{/n} "There is no simple answer... If I say you are special, it sounds hackneyed, doesn't it? But it's the truth. I've never met anyone like you before."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは再び長い間考え込み、やがてためらいがちに言った。{/n}「簡単には答えられません…あなたが特別だと言ったら、陳腐に聞こえるでしょうか？ですが、それが本当のところなんです。あなたのような人には、これまで一度も出会ったことがありませんでした」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne lapses into thought again for a long time, and then says doubtfully,{/n} "There is no simple answer... If I say you are special, it sounds hackneyed, doesn't it? But it's the truth. I've never met anyone like you before."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは再び長い間考え込み、やがてためらいがちに言った。{/n}「簡単には答えられません…あなたが特別だと言ったら、陳腐に聞こえるでしょうか？ですが、それが本当のところなんです。あなたのような人には、これまで一度も出会ったことがありませんでした」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne denkt erneut lange nach und sagt dann zweifelnd:{/n} "Es gibt keine einfache Antwort ... Wenn ich sage, Ihr seid etwas Besonderes, klingt es banal, nicht wahr? Aber es ist die Wahrheit. Ich bin noch nie jemandem wie Euch begegnet."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne lapses into thought again for a long time, and then says doubtfully,{/n} "There is no simple answer... If I say you are special, it sounds hackneyed, doesn't it? But it's the truth. I've never met anyone like you before."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne denkt erneut lange nach und sagt dann zweifelnd:{/n} "Es gibt keine einfache Antwort ... Wenn ich sage, Ihr seid etwas Besonderes, klingt es banal, nicht wahr? Aber es ist die Wahrheit. Ich bin noch nie jemandem wie Euch begegnet."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne s'abîme à nouveau dans ses pensées pendant un bon moment, puis il reprend d'un ton hésitant :{/n} « C'est difficile à expliquer... Au risque de manquer d'originalité, sachez que vous êtes quelqu'un de spécial. À vrai dire, je n'avais encore jamais rencontré personne qui vous ressemble. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne lapses into thought again for a long time, and then says doubtfully,{/n} "There is no simple answer... If I say you are special, it sounds hackneyed, doesn't it? But it's the truth. I've never met anyone like you before."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne s'abîme à nouveau dans ses pensées pendant un bon moment, puis il reprend d'un ton hésitant :{/n} « C'est difficile à expliquer... Au risque de manquer d'originalité, sachez que vous êtes quelqu'un de spécial. À vrai dire, je n'avais encore jamais rencontré personne qui vous ressemble. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne queda enfrascado en sus pensamientos durante un largo rato, y luego contesta sin demasiado convencimiento.{/n} «Me resulta difícil darle una respuesta... Si le digo que es usted especial, le sonará muy trillado, ¿verdad? Pero es la verdad. Jamás he conocido a nadie como usted».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne lapses into thought again for a long time, and then says doubtfully,{/n} "There is no simple answer... If I say you are special, it sounds hackneyed, doesn't it? But it's the truth. I've never met anyone like you before."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne queda enfrascado en sus pensamientos durante un largo rato, y luego contesta sin demasiado convencimiento.{/n} «Me resulta difícil darle una respuesta... Si le digo que es usted especial, le sonará muy trillado, ¿verdad? Pero es la verdad. Jamás he conocido a nadie como usted».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙又深思了很久，之后以充满疑惑的声音开了口。{/n}“这个问题的答案很复杂……如果我说你很特别，这恐怕会是个老掉牙的答案吧？但这就是事实，我从来没见过像你这样的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne lapses into thought again for a long time, and then says doubtfully,{/n} "There is no simple answer... If I say you are special, it sounds hackneyed, doesn't it? But it's the truth. I've never met anyone like you before."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙又深思了很久，之后以充满疑惑的声音开了口。{/n}“这个问题的答案很复杂……如果我说你很特别，这恐怕会是个老掉牙的答案吧？但这就是事实，我从来没见过像你这样的人。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, yeniden derin düşüncelere dalıp ardından tereddütle konuşuyor.{/n} "Kolay bir cevabım yok. Şahsınıza münhasır birisiniz desem bayağı mı kaçar? Gerçek bu. Benzerinizi görmedim."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne lapses into thought again for a long time, and then says doubtfully,{/n} "There is no simple answer... If I say you are special, it sounds hackneyed, doesn't it? But it's the truth. I've never met anyone like you before."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne yeniden derin düşünceye dalar, sonra tereddütle konuşur,{/n} "Kolay cevabı yok. Şahsınıza münhasır birisiniz desem bayağı mı kaçar? Ama hakikat bu. Benzerinizi görmedim."

languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne lapses into thought again for a long time, and then says doubtfully,{/n} "There is no simple answer... If I say you are special, it sounds hackneyed, doesn't it? But it's the truth. I've never met anyone like you before."
